Package com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl

Package that contains implementations of the API classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrayBytesSegment BytesSegment implementation that uses POJAs (Plain Old Java Array) for storing byte sequences.
ArrayBytesSegment.Allocator SegmentAllocator implementation that allocates ArrayByteSegments.
ArrayLongsSegment LongsSegment implementation that uses POJAs (Plain Old Java Array) for storing long sequences.
ArrayLongsSegment.Allocator SegmentAllocator implementation that allocates ArrayLongsSegments.
ByteBufferBytesSegment Segment implementation that uses ByteBuffers for storing data.
ByteBufferBytesSegment.Allocator SegmentAllocator implementation that allocates ArrayByteSegments.
ByteBufferLongsSegment Segment implementation that uses LongBuffers for storing data.
ByteBufferLongsSegment.Allocator SegmentAllocator implementation that allocates ByteBufferLongsSegments.
ChunkyBytesMemBufferImpl ChunkyBytesMemBuffer implementation used for storing entries that are sequences of byte values, and are stored as distinct entries with definite size (as per ChunkyMemBuffer).
ChunkyLongsMemBufferImpl MemBuffer implementation used for storing entries that are sequences of long values.
StreamyBytesMemBufferImpl StreamyBytesMemBuffer implementation used for storing a sequence of byte values in a single byte sequence which does not retain boundaries implied by appends (as per StreamyMemBuffer).
StreamyLongsMemBufferImpl StreamyBytesMemBuffer implementation used for storing a sequence of long values in a single long sequence which does not retain boundaries implied by appends (as per StreamyMemBuffer).
 

Package com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl Description

Package that contains implementations of the API classes.
